page.title: 18Local Amenities
page.content: {Saunders Engine Machining}has been there since 1922. It does Cylinder Boring, Crankshaft grinding, Crack Detecting, Surface Grinding, Cylinder Sleeving, Valve Seating and Brake Disc Grinding. {Bartley Football Club}It has facilities to change and one football pitch {Copythorne Parish Hall}used for dances, playgroup, Wedding Receptions, Women's Institute, Badminton, and O.A.P. Sundowners group {Spencer Stone Estate Agent,}also Agent for the Brittania Building Society. It has a Car Park and offers a photocopying service. {Reflections of Cadnam}a hairdresser for Ladies and Gents, with small jewellery sales{ {Gypsy Sellers}have made a permanant base in the area, selling fruit 'n veg
